attributes.title: CAUSED DEPRESSION
attributes.review: this is a HORRIBLE app. do NOT download. it brought nothing but VIRUSES to my phone, computer, my tv, and my brain. all of the information on there is irrelevant and then a BIG ORANGE MAN SHOWED UP AT MY FRONT DOOR WHEN I POSTED MY FIRST BAD REVIEW. IT WAS SO SCARY. ONLY DOWNLOAD THIS APP TO GIVE IT A HORRIBLE REVIEW. GEN Z, DO NOT LET OUR WORLD DOWN!! WE ARE IN FULL CONTROL!! TIK TOK FOR PRESIDENT WOOHOOOOOO

attributes.title: Cause of death
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitched so much and the person who created this is really dumb so like please remove this immediately also ALL LIVES MATTER !

attributes.title: Hate it
attributes.review: The app is soooo glitchy, as soon as I opened it, it crashed and I have perfect WiFi and data, did not make my day great again

attributes.title: Why

attributes.title: Does not supply Cheetos
attributes.review: I heard that if you sign up, he’ll build a wall of Cheetos around your house. Been 4 years, still hasn’t happened. Just the same old fascist BS...

attributes.title: BLACK LIVES MATTER
attributes.review: this is a horrible app it took hours to download and when i opened it all i saw was a orange blob🍊 then i decided to show it to my dog to see what he thought of the app and my dog suddenly died THIS APP KILLED MY DOG🦮🐶

attributes.title: This app is awful.
attributes.review: I kept trying to download it and it wouldn’t work. Then the app kept crashing. After all that i learned he’s a racist, homophobic, misogynistic, transphobic, sexist, bigot.
